sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **East West Rail autumn announcement 2025** — Latest proposals for East West Rail reflect government’s commitment to delivering improved connectivity for communities in the Oxford-Cambridge region.
- **East West Rail unveils next phase for Oxford-Cambridge growth** — East West Rail confirms next phase of construction, boosting Oxford-Cambridge links with more frequent trains, new stations and major economic growth.
- **UK airspace design service: proposed modifications to NERL licence terms** — Seeks views on the proposed modifications to terms of the national air traffic services (NATS) (En Route) plc (NERL) licence.
